div.script: var photoGallery8290= {"Album": {"title":"Photo Gallery","description":"","transitiondelay":"3","fadestyle":"NO","gallerywidth":"1220","backgroundaudio":"/cms/lib/NJ01001806/Centricity/ModuleInstance/8374/","loopaudio":"False","lgpath":"/cms/lib/NJ01001806/Centricity/ModuleInstance/8374/large/","tnpath":"/cms/lib/NJ01001806/Centricity/ModuleInstance/8374/thumbs/","Images": [{"photoname":"GL APUSH students with Congressman Malinowski","src":"GL APUSH students with Congressman Malinowski.jpg?rnd=0.741583733699091","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":".","src":"GLGBB.jpg?rnd=0.32037525126728","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"World Autism Awareness","src":"Autism.jpg?rnd=0.150536554004316","caption":"April 2 is World Autism Awareness Day and April is Autism Awareness Month--both aiming to increase understanding and acceptance of people with autism, foster worldwide support and inspire a kinder, more inclusive world.","pause":"","link":"https://www.autismspeaks.org","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Educators of the Year","src":"Educators of the Year.jpg?rnd=0.172556090249008","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Victoria Vanriele 4-Time Meet of Champions Winner","src":"unnamed-3.jpg?rnd=0.709079321338366","caption":"On Sunday, 3/8 at Ocean Breeze in Staten Island, Victoria Vanriele earned her 4th Indoor Meet of Champions title in the 800m, her 7th overall, with a time of 2:09.73. Victoria is the first female athlete to accomplish this task in the 800m in NJ, and only the 4th in the state to ever win four Indoor titles in any event. Victoria also holds the meet record in this event at 2:08.81 from 2018.\ ","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Vanriele sets 800m Venue Record!","src":"unnamed.jpg?rnd=0.436983180901494","caption":"At the NJSIAA Group 2 Indoor Championship, Senior Victoria Vanriele ran a season PR of 2:07.83, breaking her old All Group Record of 2:09.72 from 2019. This time also bests the old venue record of 2:08.81 Vanriele set in 2018. On Sunday, 3/8 Vanriele will contest her last NJSIAA High School Indoor Meet of Championship 800m.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"GL Winter Track Excels","src":"glWtrack.jpg?rnd=0.540667730635343","caption":"GL Girls Indoor Track Team placed 3rd in the North II Group 2 State Sectional Championships. Senior Jack Befeler was 3rd in the pole vault for the boys.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Math Modeling","src":"IMG_2799.jpeg?rnd=0.728256369814396","caption":"3@Task Workshop. teaching math models K12","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"GL Robotics Team Wins","src":"20200216_143920.jpg?rnd=0.872467599749783","caption":"The GL robotics team won its regional
